ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Magazine Looking to Interview Players
ygData.msgSnippet: Lol. I think my cats are probably the only thing that tear me away from EQ. I have to feed them and stuff. Well, and my family, if I have to get something for
ygData.messageBody:
Lol. I think my cats are probably the only thing that tear me away from EQ.
I have to feed them and stuff. Well, and my family, if I have to get
something for them or help them out.
And sleeping. But I sleep alot.
luv,
-Su

> Very well spoken. It's true. Most people who get THAT
> lost in EQ are the kind of people who would become
> lost in something else, if they hadn't found EQ to
> fill their time. I have a toddler and I make sure he's
> taken care of, fed, played with and put to bed before
> I dive into the world of Norrath :)
>
